 028: 	"""Calculations for the Coulomb electrostatic energy contribution.
 029: 	Ewald summation method used for long range. Each sum per ion is stored
 030: 	in a NxN matrix, where N the number of atoms in the unit cell. First
 031: 	the upper triangular matrix is evaluated and the rest is merely copied,
 032: 	thanks to the symmetry of the interactions' effect.
 033: 
 034: 	Attributes
 035:     ----------
 036: 	real_cut_off : double
 037: 		Images of ions in real space (short range) inluded in the energy sum.
 038: 	recip_cut_off : double
 039: 		Images of ions in reciprocal space (long range) inluded in the energy sum.
 040: 	alpha : double
 041: 		Constant in erfc that controls real-reciprocal spaces' balance
 042: 	made_const : double
 043: 		Madelung constant, if it is to be used
 044: 	charges : Nx1 array (int)
 045: 		List of ions' charges in respective positions
 046: 	chemical_symbols : Nx1 array (str)
 047: 		Ions' chemical symbols in respective positions
 048: 	grad : (N+3)x3 array (double)
 049: 		The gradient of the Coulomb energy w.r.t. ion positions and lattice strain.
 050: 	stresses : 3x3 array
 051: 		The gradient of the Coulomb energy w.r.t. lattice strain.
 052: 	eself : double
 053: 		Self term energy.
 054: 	ereal : double
 055: 		Real space energy.
 056: 	erecip : double
 057: 		Reciprocal space energy.
 058: 
 059: 	"""
+060: 	def __cinit__(self, chemical_symbols, N, charge_dict, filename=None):
